title: Best of The Herd for Aug 24, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Aug 24, 2020
description:
Don't freak out about the Clippers losing because of one great shot

Earl Thomas always makes himself the victim

The 76ers problems go way beyond their head coach

People are finally realizing what Colin has been saying about Aaron Rodgers for years

Where Colin was right, where Colin was wrong


Guest: Howie Long, NFL on FOX & Hall of Famer

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
